actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to study the impact of the cost of living in the State of Alaska on the tax burden imposed on its residents.
short_title: Alaska Cost of Living Tax Impact Study Act

summary.text: Alaska Cost of Living Tax Impact Study Act - Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to conduct a study of the impact of the high cost of living in the State of Alaska on the tax burden imposed on the income and estate and gift taxes paid by the residents under the Internal Revenue Code. Details the scope of such study and requires its submission to Congress within one year of enactment of this Act.

titles.title: Alaska Cost of Living Tax Impact Study Act
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Treasury to study the impact of the cost of living in the State of Alaska on the tax burden imposed on its residents.
